Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils

Class Utils_String

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils_String
  • public class Utils_String
extends Utils
    Utility methods for string manipulation and creation needed by SweetBlue, mostly for debug purposes.

      • hexStringToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStringToBytes​(String string,
                                      Utils_String.HexOption... options)
        Convert a hex string into a byte array. This method can be fairly robust, depending on the Utils_String.HexOptions you pass in. If a HexOption isn't specified when a certain condition happens, null will be returned. For instance, if there are spaces in the string, and you don't pass in Utils_String.HexOption.ALLOW_SPACES, null will be returned.

      • hexStringToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStringToBytes​(String string)
        Overload of hexStringToBytes(String, HexOption...), which passes in every Utils_String.HexOption.

      • bytesToHexString

        public static String bytesToHexString​(byte[] bytes)
        Convert a byte array to a hex string. The hex strings created by this method will always return capitalized letters.

      • bytesToBinaryString

        public static String bytesToBinaryString​(byte[] bytes)
        Convert a byte array to a binary string

      • bytesToBinaryString

        public static String bytesToBinaryString​(byte[] bytes,
                                         int bytesBetweenSpaces)
        Convert a byte array to a binary string Also inserts spaces between every count bytes (for legibility)

      • binaryStringToBytes

        public static byte[] binaryStringToBytes​(String s)
                                  throws Exception
        Converts a binary string to a byte array

        Exception

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty​(String string)
        Returns true if the given String is null, or has a length of 0.
